name: Coastal Beaches Adventure
description: Driftwood Tours is trusted by over 320 happy customers, earning a 5-star rating! Explore real reviews and share your own experience.
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Coastal Beaches Adventure ===
Skip to content Skip to footer Close Coastal Beaches Adventure Cape Gloucester & Dingo Beach 7-Hour Guided Scenic Tour of 5 Beaches. 167 reviews Duration – 7 hours | Price $140 Local Tour Guide – Cherene Start Time – 9:00 AM Escape the crowds and discover the Whitsundays’ hidden coastal beaches with a full-day adventure to Dingo Beach and Cape Gloucester region, just 45 minutes from Airlie Beach Locations Visited – Dingo Beach, Rocky Beach, Nellys Bay, Froggies Beach, Cape Gloucester and Montes resort. Lunch is available for purchase at Cape Gloucester Resort Tour Type: Sightseeing Beach Tour Book Now What You’ll Experience On This Tour Scenic Drive Through the Whitsundays Hinterland Kick off the day with a picturesque drive through sugar cane fields and cattle country as you head north toward the quieter side of the Whitsundays. Explore Secluded Beaches Visit Dingo Beach, Rocky Beach, Nelly’s Bay, Froggies, and more. Each one has its own vibe; some are great for swimming, while others are perfect for just lying back and soaking up the sun. Froggies Beach Lookout & Photography Moments Snap photos among massive granite boulders and sweeping Coral Sea views. This spot feels raw, wild, and totally off the beaten track. Cape Gloucester Resort & Montes Retreat Relax at a beachfront oasis with cocktails, hammocks, a poolside bar, and an optional gourmet lunch. Perfect for guests who like their adventure with a touch of barefoot luxury. Swim, Wander, or Just Chill This isn’t a packed itinerary;  it’s your chance to breathe, recharge, and soak in some of the most beautiful, uncrowded beaches in the Whitsundays. Real Stories from a Local Guide Get to know the region through local tales, quirky history, and insights into the coast’s changing landscapes, all shared by your passionate guide, Cherene. Driftwood Tours Reviews All reviews Google Tripadvisor Trustindex Excellent 5.0 321 reviews 5.0 Excellent 321 reviews Write a review Google Tripadvisor Trustindex Excellent 5.0 167 reviews 5.0 Excellent 167 reviews Write a review Excellent 5.0 150 reviews 5.0 Excellent 150 reviews Write a review Excellent 5.0 4 reviews 5.0 Excellent 4 reviews Write a review Posted on Google Jesús 22 January 2026 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. +38 Realice con esta empresa el amanecer con canguros en Hillsborough y la experiencia fue increíble. La recogida puntual y muy temprana, a las 03:00 am en tu hotel y a las 10:30 am estás de vuelta. Llegas aún siendo de noche, esperas que amanezca para ver cómo se alimentan los canguros, van a la orilla e incluso algunos luchan entre ellos. Luego subes a un mirador para ver la playa (unos 15 minutos andando) y finalmente desayunas antes de volver a Airlie Beach! Hide Posted on Tripadvisor Aylen D 9 January 2026 Verified Beautiful experience in the creek and finding hidden inland gems of the Whitsundays We went on the Conway nationalPark bushwalk and cedar creek falls tour and wow! Swimming in the creek was so refreshing and beautiful. Cherene is a great tour guide, keeps the energy up with her enthusiasm! Highly recommend! Hide Posted on Google coen breedijk 4 January 2026 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. +1 Cherene was amazing! So much energy and took such great care of us thanks so much for the great experience! Hide Posted on Google Lois Britnor 21 December 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. Shereen is knowledgeable and full of energy! Enjoyed the tour Posted on Google Janice Rowe 5 December 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. We both thoroughly enjoyed our tour Cherene our guide was very knowledgeable and showed us places we could not believe existed we would highly recommend this 3 hour tour. Regards Jan &Rod Rowe. Posted on Tripadvisor Kimberly J 2 December 2025 Verified Don't hesitate, go do it! It was absolutely amazing, and Cherene was the perfect guide! You could ask her anything, and she was so joyful and kind! Posted on Trustindex Kevin M 11 November 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Trustindex. A truly memorable experience in the Aussie bush I did the waterfalls and bushwalk eco adventure. Our guide, Cherene, was very knowledgeable and attentive. We learnt all about the wildlife and plant life. Lots of snacks and water provided. The waterfall was beautiful, spent some time swimming on the rock pool. Overall, a great tour, which I thoroughly enjoyed. Thank you Cherene. Posted on Tripadvisor Adria E 19 January 2026 Verified Nice day of sightseeing! Had a lovey day exploring the Bowen Beach area with Cherene. She is extremely knowledgeable and enthusiastic. She took good care of us on a very hot day. We saw some beautiful scenery, learned some history and had a delicious fish and chips lunch. She's a lovely person to spend the day with. Hide Posted on Tripadvisor Frances C 9 January 2026 Verified Rainforest walk and water falls I would highly recommend this activity to anyone. The waterfalls were flowing when we went. It was so cool and refreshing. It was a quick drive over. First we took a short looped trail, where we went through a rainforest. It was lovely to spot all the flora and fauna, and growing fungi. Afterwards we had some snacks and went to the falls, which were happily flowing. All swimming levels welcomed. Cherene made us all feel comfortable, was very knowledgeable and came prepared. I think that everyone should experience the falls while visiting Airlie ! Thank you Cherene Hide Posted on Tripadvisor Joe D 3 January 2026 Verified Ceder Creek Falls Spent the day at Conway National Park walking through the lush rainforest then onto Cedar creek falls for a dip in the water. Hide Posted on Google MP Frost 13 December 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. +0 Cherene was one of the best tour guides we have had in all our trips. She was very knowledgeable and inventive in the locations she brought us to on our tour. She was thoughtful of the heat and accommodating to our late arrival. It was such an excellent experience that we would love to go on another tour with her! To add - a pleasant surprise we learned was she worked at a summer camp in our home town half the world away for 15 years. Posted on Google Sophie Lem 4 December 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. +4 The tour was exceptional, and Cherene proved to be an outstanding guide, demonstrating extensive knowledge. We explored numerous beaches and inland viewpoints, with Cherene providing insightful information at each stop. Furthermore, her skills as a photographer were remarkable, as she consistently went above and beyond to capture the most beautiful photos. Posted on Google Magdalena Galek 24 November 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. Very knowledgeable guide, great snacks! Fun tour, small group. Good amount of walking, great time swimming! Recommend even if the waterfall doesn’t flow. Posted on Google David Williams 7 November 2025 Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google. Absolutely fabulous! We were able to experience a very informative and interesting tour of Arlie Beach in comfort. David and Anny Posted on Tripadvisor Kathy B 18 January 2026 Verified Great tour, Cherene was fabulous Very well-organized tour that made great use of the time. We saw many excellent sites and were taken to some great photo spots. Our guide, Cherene, was knowledgeable and informative, adding helpful context throughout. Everything ran smoothly with a comfortable pace. A solid choice for seeing a lot and learning along the way. It was timed well for a cruise ship stop.
=== TOUR END: Coastal Beaches Adventure ===

name: Bushwalk and 50's Diner Guided Tour
description: Driftwood Tours is trusted by over 320 happy customers, earning a 5-star rating! Explore real reviews and share your own experience.
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Bushwalk and 50's Diner Guided Tour ===
Skip to content Skip to footer Close Bushwalk and 50's Diner Guided Tour 3.5 Hours Guided Scenic Tour To  Conway National Park and Georges Diner in Conway 167 reviews Duration – 3 hours | Price $120 Local Tour Guide – Cherene Start Time – 9am (seasonal) Take a guided rainforest bushwalk through the Whitsundays’ lush interior before stepping back in time for lunch at George’s 50s Diner—where nature meets nostalgic charm. Locations Visited – Conway National Park, George’s Diner (Conway Beach) Nature walk + retro diner experience in one tour Tour Type : Bushwalk & Cultural Combo Book Now What You’ll Experience On This Tour Guided Rainforest Bushwalk in Conway National Park Start the day surrounded by nature on a peaceful bushwalk along either Kingfisher Circuit or the Coral Beach track. These rainforest trails wind through dense native bush and offer plenty of chances to spot birds, butterflies, fungi, and native plants. Learn from a Certified Eco Guide This isn’t just a walk, it’s a look into the Whitsundays’ inland ecosystems, led by Cherene, a certified Savannah and Eco Nature Guide who shares local stories, cultural insight, and fun nature facts along the way. Step into a 1950s Time Capsule After your walk, trade the rainforest for retro. George’s Diner at Conway Beach serves up nostalgic charm with jukebox tunes, neon signs, comfy booths, and legendary milkshakes. Perfect Blend of Nature and Nostalgia This tour is a quirky combo that hits both ends of the Whitsundays experience, tranquil forest followed by a diner straight out of Grease. A Short, Sweet Escape from the Ordinary Just 3.5 hours long, this tour is ideal if you’re looking for something low-key, offbeat, and full of local character. Driftwood Tours Reviews Bushwalk and 50's Diner FAQ 1. How long is the tour, and when does it start? The tour runs for 3 to 3.5 hours with a 9:00 AM seasonal departure, perfect for a fun half-day outing with a twist. 2. What’s included in the tour price? The tour includes guided commentary and return transport to both the bushwalk location and George’s Diner. Food and drinks at the diner are optional and at your own cost. 3. Do I need to be fit to join this tour? A moderate level of fitness is recommended for the bushwalk (2km return). Tracks are well maintained but do include uneven terrain and gentle hills. Comfortable walking shoes are a must. 4. What makes George’s Diner special? George’s Diner is a 50s-themed American-style diner with authentic decor, a killer soundtrack, and what many say are the best milkshakes in Australia. It’s a favourite with both locals and visitors. 5. Who is the guide? Your guide is Cherene, a seasoned bushwalking leader with years of experience in eco-tourism. She’s known for her humour, passion, and encyclopaedic knowledge of the Whitsundays’ wild side. About Driftwood Tours Hi, I’m Cherene, the owner and guide behind Driftwood Tours. With over 30 years in outdoor recreation and tourism, I’ve created a collection of land-based Whitsunday tours that are personal, meaningful, and full of stories, nature, and local insight — learn more about my journey here .
